product_name: DiorDior Forever Fluid Skin Glow Foundation
summary: SummaryDior Forever Fluid Skin Glow Foundation with 24h wear, radiant medium-to-full coverage and hydration. With 86% skincare ingredients to visibly improve skin over time.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis new generation foundation is made in 42 shades according to a strict list of ingredients. Heat and humidity-resistant,* it delivers 24h** color-true wear and hydration while visibly reducing pores for a smooth and radiant complexion. Packaging is recyclable and uses recycled materials.***Research Results*Heat-resistant up to 30-33 C and humidity-resistant up to 70-75% RH**Instrumental test on 20 women.Item 2604999How To UseBegin by patting a small amount onto the zones that require the most coverage, then blend outwards with smoothing strokes.For perfectly uniform coverage, apply the formula with a foundation brush.The formula wears for up to 24 hours, eliminating the need for touch-ups throughout the day.IngredientsActive: Octisalate 4.50%, Titanium Dioxide 4.23%. Inactive: Aqua (Water), Alcohol, Methyl Trimethicone, Isododecane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Glycerin, PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Trimethyl Pentaphenyl Trisiloxane, Acrylates/Dimethicone Copolymer, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cellulose, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Sodium Myristoyl Glutamate, Parfum (Fragrance), Propylene Carbonate, Chlorphenesin, Vp/Va Copolymer, Alumina, Stearic Acid, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Tromethamine, Tocopherol, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Hexadecene, Hydrolyzed Viola Tricolor Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain : CI 77491,CI 77492,CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Begin by patting a small amount onto the zones that require the most coverage, then blend outwards with smoothing strokes.For perfectly uniform coverage, apply the formula with a foundation brush.The formula wears for up to 24 hours, eliminating the need for touch-ups throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Expired product
reviews.comments: Received my order today from Ulta, and it's already expired. Will buy directly from Dior from now on. Do better, Ulta.

reviews.headline: My favorite foundation
reviews.comments: I have rosacea and little bumps on my cheeks due to my rosacea. I pump 3 full pumps on the back of my hand, apply it to my face with a foundation brush, and I'm done. The finish is absolutely gorgeous, especially when pairing it with Huda Beauty's Cherry loose setting powder under my eyes, my nose, above my lip, and my chin. It's necessary for me to find a good foundation and a good powder because I live in Phoenix, AZ. As soon as I step outside, the heat beats down on me. The SPF in this foundation is obviously not enough, so first I moisturize with Pond's, put a 60+ SPF sunscreen cream on, Power Grip primer, then my foundation. My foundation has never looked so good! I don't care what anyone else says, but I love the scent of the foundation. I feel so pretty and luxe when applying it and smelling it. I'm on my second bottle and I will definitely be purchasing it again as it is my new regular foundation. I only hope that maybe Dior considers adding more SPF to it, but not if it changes the current formula.

reviews.headline: Only reason for a 3 is the price
reviews.comments: My favorite foundation I mix it with elf halo glow. It's the best foundation I've used

reviews.headline: Foundation my foundation
reviews.comments: This has so far been the best foundation I have found for my mature skin. I am so far happy with it. I am a week in and still happy!!

reviews.headline: Not for textured skin
reviews.comments: The finish was very greasy and blotchy. I tried with several different applicators and primers. I have textured, dry skin. Would probably look great as light coverage on clear skin!

reviews.headline: My go to favorite.
reviews.comments: This is my go to foundation. Absolutely love the color match and the sustainability of the product.

reviews.headline: Can't take the smell
reviews.comments: I love this foundation but the smell is outrageous! I cannot take it. I smelled it for a couple of hours. I never write reviews .

reviews.headline: Not that good
reviews.comments: It feels great, and initially goes on great. I always use the Porefessional primer w/ any foundation.. then a sheer setting powder. Well my normal 2 foundations look great all day, pores look normal. The Dior lasted a couple hours before creeping all in my pores- making them stand out too much. Don't recommend if u have somewhat large pores.. mine r like medium craters w/ no makeup- lol

reviews.headline: Love but hate
reviews.comments: I have been using this for over 2 years now and love the dewy look and that it's buildable. Blush, powder, and concealer goes over it perfectly. It does oxidize and has an odd smell though. To me it doesn't smell like fragrance, but more like a chemical smell such as alcohol. For the price point, I think I will be researching alternatives.

reviews.headline: Leaves a "sticky" texture on skin; too shiny
reviews.comments:
Inloce a foubdation that guves a natural finish (not too matte, not shiny) and a bit of a "radiant" look with lightvreflecting sheen (but not some ghastly psychedelic prism effect). 

Based in thecdescriotion, inhooed this fitvthe above. It dies not. It keaves a shiny finish that is a bit "sticky" to the touch. I dud not care for it. I have nornal skin, perhaps occasionally (winter) on the dry side.

reviews.headline: Genuinely the worst foundation
reviews.comments: I have tried working with this product in sooo many ways and no matter what it becomes textural, dry, and patchy. Its just plain ugly. Ive never experienced anything like it. I also never leave reviews but after many months of trial and disappointment, I felt compelled to tell you to save your money. Love Dior generally good grief

reviews.headline: Shade 0CR
reviews.comments: A makeup artist applied this shade and it looked identical to my Cool tone pale skin. I was given a sample and used it at home. The color faded and turned out whiter than my skin tone. Half of my face was white and the other side was my natural pale skin with rosacea. Applied to entire face and I see streaks on my cheeks and it doesn't set well with Setting spray. I wanted to love this but its not giving me a natural dewy finish or the same color match. Too white!

reviews.headline: Just no
reviews.comments: This is actually the worst foundation I've ever used. I don't understand any positive reviews?? Cakey, oxidized, and hard to wash off. My skin looked more even and glowy before I put this junk on. Dior should stick to making handbags.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Best foundation ever.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: The foundation goes on smoothly it gives a natural finish but gets so freaking blotchy and basically disappears when wearing after an hour or two not worth the price

reviews.headline: Foundation
reviews.comments: I love the foundation looks flawy but after 5 hours i get patchy spots in my face. My face is not oily is more dry i use a hydrating moisturizer but not working for me

reviews.headline: Great foundation
reviews.comments: Extremely hydrating and moisturizing. Exactly what I was looking for!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Great formula for coverage and long wear
reviews.comments:
I'm Asian fair/light neutral skin and olive overtone, and for reference my PERFECT shade is Est√©e Lauder's 1W2 Sand; even though the Dior glow foundation doesn't have my color (1.5N was too pink and 1.5W was juuuuust a bit too yellow), I fell in love with the formula the first time i tried it - it was instant natural but impressive coverage, with just pea size product on my brush! And this formula is extremely glowy, so a litte definitely goes a Loooong way. 
I have also been mixing this foundation with lighter BB cream to create my own shade, its been great - the glow stayed on ALL DAY. In comparison, Est√©e Lauder is just a bit smoother and matte. 
Hope this helps!

reviews.headline: Good!
reviews.comments: I like this foundation, I would love it if my skin werent so problematic. If you have no acne or discoloration im sure this will be great for you! It has a nice glowy look without looking oily. It did not separate or settle into pores! Definitely worth a try

reviews.headline: Love but the transfer is so bad!
reviews.comments: I really like this foundation. I feel like it has such a pretty glowy finish. I like the dewy finish even though I have oily skin so I do start to look oily much faster but still very pretty. I would love this product much more if it didnt transfer! The transfer is so bad and I switched to a different foundation because if it.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received the Dior Forever Skin Glow foundation from Influenster as a free sample for my honest review. I use the shade 1W Warm and it is the perfect for me. I am usually a NC15 in MAC, and have fair skin with a warm undertone. Dior has a good range of shades, so I think most people would be able to find their match I have normal to dry skin, which is mostly dry in the winter, so I'm always looking for foundations like this one to add extra hydration.

I have tried the old formula of this foundation and it was too dry for my skin, however the skin glow version of this foundation is perfect for my dry skin. It helps to hydrate and doesn't stick to my dry patches. 

The foundation can be easily buildable, depending on the look you're going for. If I am looking for a healthy, dewy look I use my beauty blender. If I am looking for a more full coverage look, I use my flat foundation brush to stipple on the product. Either way it is applied it sinks right into my skin without siting on to of my skin like some foundations. It minimizes the appearance of pores and makes my complexion look healthy and plump. 

I live in a Florida where it gets humid and warm even during the winter months. This foundation does stand up against the heat, even without setting with a powder! No need to reapply. The foundation could easily be worn for several hours without breaking up or melting off. Also, I really appreciate the added sunscreen to help protect my skin from the Florida UV rays. 

I would serenity recommend this product to friend and family. Dior did such a good job with this foundation because it makes your skin look like yours, just better. The packaging is also very luxe and minimalist looking. Sustainable package is important to me, so the bottle being made from recycled materials, and that you are able to recycle the bottle itself is an added bonus I will repurchase this foundation when I run out!
faceoff_positive.headline: Beautiful foundation that gives you a healthy glow

faceoff_negative.comments:
*All photos are taken in the natural light and are without any editing* 

Ahh I don't know where to begin with this one as there were a few issues. I had such high hopes and expectations for a product from such a prestige brand, but, alas. For a foundation that's supposed to be hydrating, this couldn't be more drying and matte on my skin. At first, I thought I got the wrong one. No, this is the new formula (according to many devoted users online). I think it accentuated all the imperfections of my skin. It made my skin feel tighter as the day went on, yet the coverage was not as desired. The other problem was the shade. I got a neutral cause that's what usually works for my skin that is cool-toned with bright warm freckled. The neutrals make it all look more even. However, the shade 0.5N (which seemed like it should have been light enough for my fair skin) was waaay too yellow, and oxidized into a shade that was a couple of tones darker than what I was aiming for. The oxidization with this one is intense. It became too dark and too orange for me. I don't mind the scent of this foundation, but it could do without it (it reminded me of an air freshener scent, to be honest). The last issue I had with this is removing it. My cleanser that I use for any makeup removal didn't work on this one. I had to "wipe" the foundation off with a cleansing pad. It's so sad to be so disappointed with the product that comes with a hefty price tag, but here we are. This one is a strong pass for me. Hoping I get to be wowed by Dior in the future, but today is not the day... at least not with this foundation.
faceoff_negative.headline: Confused and disappointed.
